text: Monsters is an anthology of science fiction short stories edited by Isaac Asimov, Martin H. Greenberg and Charles G. Waugh as the eighth volume in their Isaac Asimov's Wonderful Worlds of Science Fiction series. It was first published in paperback by Signet/New American Library in July 1988. The first British edition was issued in paperback by Robinson in July 1989. The book collects eleven novellas, novelettes and short stories by various science fiction authors, together with an introduction by Asimov. ==Contents== *"Introduction: Monsters" (Isaac Asimov) *"Passengers" (Robert Silverberg) *"The Botticelli Horror" (Lloyd Biggle, Jr.) *"The Shapes" (J.
